page.title: 04AS DUSK FALLS ON WARNDON
page.content: At this time the area seems to come to life. The orange lights on the lamposts give Warndon an{eerie appearance. Around Warndon the teenagers come out and the older men nip down to the local pub. The punks come out and hang around in groups near walls with marker pens. Then they light their cigarettes and start smoking, usually under lamposts. Some start spraying cans of paint on the walls. You can go to{the shops}and see it sprayed over the walls. This isn't very nice but it gives the place a character. The pubs get most business from middle aged people who are mostly regulars. The favourite night is Saturday night. When night settles in the punks go home and the pubs close. The Warndon area goes to sleep and all is quiet.
